Fundraisers

Schools, Religious Organizations, Local Service Clubs, Athletic Teams, Community Projects, If you are a Not-For-Profit organization, you qualify.

What Do You Have To Do?

  • Fill Out A Short Application and choose which booklet you would like to sell.
  • Sell A Four Coupon Book for the “GOOD” Wash for $20 and you Keep $10.00.
  • Sell A Four Coupon Book for the “BETTER” Wash at $28 and you Keep $14.00.
  • Sell a Four Coupon Book for the “BEST” Wash and you Keep $20.00.
  • At the end of a Thirty Day Period, Return all unsold Coupon Books for immediate reconciliation.

Advantages!

  • No One Is At Risk Washing Cars on a lot where there are many moving vehicles.
  • No one is in the hot sun.
  • No Chemicals are rinsed off the lot and into the storm drains where they proceed directly to the ocean.
  • You sell the books and the buyers come to one of our three locations in Orange County. Our equipment does the work, recycles the water, and collects the dirt which is then hauled off and disposed in a legal and environmentally responsible manner.

How Do You Start?

Complete the application and click on the Send button. It’s that easy.
